post:
When it comes to websites, speed is important. How quickly your website loads affects your visitors’ user experience, conversion rates and ultimately where your site ranks in Google’s organic search results.
So, if you’re looking for the absolute fastest WordPress hosting with low price, SmartResel Hosting offers the best performing server and configuration for running a fast WordPress website. Our web hosting solutions are fine-tuned, blazing fast and are ready for you.

- 99.9% Server uptime

- FREE Migration Assistance
- Instant Setup
- 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Resource Limitation for each Account
• SPEED=100%
• PMEM=2GB
• VMEM=0 (disabled)
• IO=4096KB/s
• IOPS=2,024
• NPROC=100
• EP=30
• Inodes: 100,000 Soft limit and 250,000 Hard Limit per cPanel account.
